name: places/ChIJIaXwQxr2wokR9MDDZp42KY4
formattedAddress: 12 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10026, USA

originalText.text:
When you want to hear from heaven just come, because God wants to speak to you during the worship experience. This is a place that welcomes you with open arms when you need to feel the love of God. Have an encounter that last a lifetime and makes you want to share with your family and friends.

The congregation are an extension of its Shepherd Wesley W. Wilson, Jr. who intern brings a challenging and heartfelt message that will encourage you. From the moment you enter their facilities know you may have come in a stranger, but you will leave feeling like family. The choice is yours.

One block away from Central Park North, you have access to New York's Metropolitan Transit Authority in addition to what can be limited parking. Their beautiful state of the art facility is a welcoming environment for everyone in attendance as it is comfortable.

One block away from Central Park North, you have access to New York's Metropolitan Transit Authority in addition to what can be limited parking. Their beautiful state of the art facility is a welcoming environment for everyone in attendance as it is comfortable.

originalText.text:
Praise the Lord! My name is Kenny B.Came from FOSTER PROJECTS!
Back in 1981, age 16,  I was Baptized and Born Again Praise God! This was and always will be my church. My Reverand's name was Reverand Smalls! He was a great preacher of the Word of God and made it his business to reach out to all...especially the people in the neighborhood sick and suffering from addiction, alcoholism, homelessness, the youth, the elderly, and all in between. I walked by the church the other day coming from Mount Sinai! Two ministers from the church reached out to me...they prayed for me and gave me a wonderful track! I got teary eyed as the Holy Spirit warmed me up and filled me! Always there! Memories came back and all good....I'm going to attend the Bible studies I believe are on Wednesdays..6:30pm...and 12:00 service on Sundays! I go to church online. There is s fellow I grew up with who is a Pastor and his God given church is in Carmel, NY. He's very much like Reverand Wilson...on fire for our Lord and Savior! Teaching and Living the Word! I went to Second Cannan Baptist Church for 30 years! Relocated and left NYC for upstate! I moved to Albany. I've been back for a while now...back in NYC...the Pandemic hit us hard..I managed to not catch it, vaccinated and boostered! And I'm coming back home thanks to my Lord directing me back to my loving church... SECOND CANNAN BAPTIST CHURCH!
THANK YOU FOR ALLOWING ME TO SHARE AND GOD BLESS YOU ALL!
AMEN!
SINCERELY YOURS,
KENNY B.

originalText.text: Pastor Wilson is a true Shepherd of the Gospel and seasoned Teacher of the Word.  I enjoy and feel encouraged every time I attend.  Highly recommend going no matter where you serve.

text.text: Pastor Wilson is a true Shepherd of the Gospel and seasoned Teacher of the Word.  I enjoy and feel encouraged every time I attend.  Highly recommend going no matter where you serve.

originalText.text: Pastor Wilson is a God Loving MOG. He is an awesome teacher of the word. When you leave the Church service you will leave with a word in you.

text.text: Pastor Wilson is a God Loving MOG. He is an awesome teacher of the word. When you leave the Church service you will leave with a word in you.

originalText.text: The spirit of God is always felt and the pastor gets his point across every single time. Amazing way to start your week.
